item.title: News feed
item.description: This is the news feed. Any family-wide updates you publish on the "parents" dashboard will appear here. Posts made here are visible to any visitors on the site. To create a new post, visit the parents dashboard and sign in with your id.

item.title: Welcome to Family Task!
item.description: Family Task is your all-in-one daily chore/task tracking software. Family Task is an open source project, meaning that it always has been and always will be free. For more information, check out http://github.com/ARMmaster17/familytask/.
